title: PENTASTEAL A LEE SIN. THANKS MATES T.T
body: Egy csodálatos Pentakill! szinte. Érezd jól magad, legalább!

replies.body:
Hello.

This is the Hungarian forums, for guess what HUNGARIANS. Please keep the foreign material out, if you don't speak our lang.

Thanks.
Sorry, i forgot to translate in your language, it's done now! :)
This still doesn't make the situtation much better as it suffers from grammatical flaws.
I know but with this i can share my video to hungarian people :)
Ez a magyar fórum te állat te. Beszélj magyarul vagy ne postolj ide. (Speak hungarian or dont make post here.)
